text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires that for every control point, the framework specifies materiality thresholds/tolerances and predefined escalation/remediation triggers and timelines if thresholds are breached. The candidate answer consistently includes a 'Threshold Alert' column in the KPI tables for every control point, which serves as the materiality threshold/tolerance. Furthermore, for several KPIs (e.g., Control Point 1.2, KPI 'Remediation rate for deficient documentation'), it specifies a timeline for remediation ('100% within 30 days' vs '>10% unresolved'), satisfying the requirement for predefined escalation/remediation triggers and timelines.", "criterion_id": "c81f11b1-1de7-4a08-9bea-c09bd530c8ac"}
